ingredients: 1 can Cento Cannellini Beans (19 oz), drained
4 tbsp Cento Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1 large russet potato, peeled and cut into 1/2 inch pieces
1 can Cento Chef's Cut® Tomatoes (28 oz)
2 boxes Cento All Natural Chicken Stock (64 fl oz)
6 cups savoy cabbage, cored and shredded
1 can Cento Red Kidney Beans (19 oz), drained
Salt and Cento Ground Black Pepper, to taste
Salt and Cento Ground Black Pepper, to taste
